# Paige Julianne Sullivan - Professional Consulting Website

> Polymath technologist with 30+ years solving complex problems across every layer of the stack.

## About

Paige Julianne Sullivan is a Full-Stack Polymath, Cloud Architect, AI Engineer, Language Designer, and Open-Source Author based in Thomasville, NC. She is available for consulting engagements and part-time contract work (remote).

## Contact

- Email: paige@paigejulianne.com
- Phone: 919-798-0699
- Location: Thomasville, NC (Remote work preferred)
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/paigejulianne
- GitHub: https://github.com/paigejulianne

## Expertise

### Technical Skills

**Languages:** Go, PHP, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, C/C++, Bash, SQL, HTML/CSS

**Frameworks:** React, Vue, Laravel, Symfony, Tailwind CSS, WebAssembly (WASM)

**Cloud & DevOps:** GCP (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Memorystore), AWS, Azure, Docker, Terraform, CI/CD, GitHub Actions

**AI & ML:** Claude API, Google Gemini, Local LLM deployment & training, Prompt engineering, AI integration

**Databases:** MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, Redis, MS SQL Server

**Specializations:** DSL Design, Graph Engines, Real-time WebSocket, Compiler/Parser Design, System Architecture

## Key Accomplishments

- 30+ years of professional experience
- 4 startups founded
- 100+ applications delivered
- 99.999% uptime achieved (Concert Telecommunications)
- 7 open-source REDCap modules adopted internationally

## Current Work

**Topology.Cloud** (Founder / Chief Architect, Nov 2025 - Present)
Building a comprehensive Building Infrastructure Management Platform - a digital twin system for modeling electrical, plumbing, HVAC, networking, A/V, security, and fire protection systems using directed acyclic graph architecture.

- Designed Topology Formula Language (TFL) - a custom DSL with lexer, parser, and AST
- Created Component Modeling Language (CML) with 9,500+ XML-based component definitions
- Built real-time collaboration system using binary WebSocket protocol

## Notable Experience

- **Johns Hopkins University** - Programmer Analyst, Bloomberg School of Public Health (2020-2025)
- **IBM Corporation** - Senior Software Engineer & Advisory Technical Lead (2004-2008, 2019)
- **Cisco Systems** - Senior Software Engineer (2009-2010)
- **Concert Telecommunications** - Founder / Lead Engineer (2008-2014)

## Education

- NC A&T State University - Computer Science
